org.scale7.cassandra.pelops.support
Class AbstractIntegrationTest

java.lang.Object
  org.scale7.cassandra.pelops.support.AbstractIntegrationTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonsBackedPoolFactoryBeanIntegrationTest, CommonsBackedPoolIntegrationTest, MutatorIntegrationTest, SelectorIntegrationTest
public abstract class AbstractIntegrationTest
extends Object

Abstract integration test class which runs its own embedded cassandra server.
